<<<<<<< HEAD
By the King. A proclamation for the prizing of vvines. England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
[2] leaves.
By Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most excellent Majestie: And by the assignes of Iohn Bill, [Imprinted at London : 1641 [i.e. 1642]
Imprint from colophon. Date of publication according to Lady Day dating. Arms 24. Imperfect as filmed? Cropped at foot of leaf [1] affecting text? Reproduction of original in the British Library.
=======

[2] leaves.
By Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most excellent Majestie: And by the assignes of Iohn Bill, [Imprinted at London : 1641 [i.e. 1642]
Imprint from colophon. Date of publication according to Lady Day dating. Arms 24. Imperfect as filmed? Cropped at foot of leaf [1] affecting text? Reproduction of original in the British Library.
the Kings most excellent Majestie: And
Robert Barker
